medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: A non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce pain and inflammation.
medicines.side_effects: Headache, upset stomach, skin rash, or increased sensitivity to the sun
medicines.precautions: Do not take with naproxen or aspirin, if pregnant or breastfeeding, or if you have a heart condition.

medicines.name: Lisinopril
medicines.description: An ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and congestive heart failure.
medicines.side_effects: Low blood pressure, fluid retention, cough, shortness of breath, or fatigue.
medicines.precautions: If pregnant or breastfeeding, or if you have heart problems, kidney problems, or low blood pressure, consult your doctor before taking.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: An oral medication used to treat type 2 diabetes.
medicines.side_effects: Low blood sugar, numbness, or tingling, blurred vision, or unpleasant taste.
medicines.precautions: Do not take with glipizide or glimepiride, if you have a heart condition, kidney problems, or diabetic ketoacidosis, or if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

medicines.name: Albuterol
medicines.description: A short-acting bronchodilator used to treat asthma and open the airways for better breathing.
medicines.side_effects: Nausea, dizziness, fast heartbeat, chest tightness, or shortness of breath.
medicines.precautions: Do not take if you have narrow-angle glaucoma, cardiac arrhythmias, or blood pressure problems.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: An antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
medicines.side_effects: Diarrhea, upset stomach, sore throat, or change in taste or smell.
medicines.precautions: Do not take if you are allergic to penicillin, if you have a stomach ulcer, kidney disease, or severe skin rash.
